short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync Optobet settings, inputs, and betslips across devices, and view current betslips in a side panel while on your book's site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Optobet Chrome Extension makes life easier for users of optobet.io. 

Simply install to immediately begin syncing user settings, game inputs, and betslips across any device where the extension is installed. 

For laptop users, pin the extension to your Chrome toolbar so that with one click you can keep your betslips visible in a sidebar as you switch between tabs and navigate to your bookmaker's website.

DISCLAIMER: The content on optobet.io and this extension is for entertainment purposes only and does not involve real money gambling.
